p: Table 3 shows MDRI estimates for all subtypes, and by subtype (B, C, D and A1), for a range of ODn thresholds in combination with a viral load threshold (>1,000c/mL). We did not observe statistically significant differences between subtype-specific MDRI estimates and the estimates for all other subtypes combined (using a two-sample Z-test) for either assay at any ODn threshold. MDRI estimates for a wider range of ODn and viral load thresholds are reported in S1 Table.
